thread.title: BRIEF-Iconix Brand Announces Private Exchange Of About $110 Million Of Its Convertible Notes

title: BRIEF-Iconix Brand Announces Private Exchange Of About $110 Million Of Its Convertible Notes
text:
February 12, 2018 / 1:56 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Iconix Brand Announces Private Exchange Of About $110 Million Of Its Convertible Notes Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Iconix Brand Group Inc: 
* ICONIX BRAND GROUP ANNOUNCES PRIVATE EXCHANGE OF APPROXIMATELY $110 MILLION OF ITS CONVERTIBLE NOTES AND PROVIDES 2018 OUTLOOK * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $190 MILLION TO $220 MILLION 
* REITERATING 2017 REVENUE AND NON GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE WITHIN PREVIOUSLY RELEASED GUIDANCE 
* ‍SIGNED A NEW MULTI-YEAR LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH TARGET FOR UMBRO BRAND​ 
* SAYS HAS INITIATED A COST SAVINGS PLAN TO “IMPROVE PROFITABILITY AND FREE CASH FLOW” 
* EXPECTS TO ACHIEVE ANNUAL SAVINGS OF ABOUT $12 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
